Package com.example.solocarry.model

Class Code

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.solocarry.model.Code
  • public class Code
extends java.lang.Object
    This is Code class that models the behaviour of a Treasure Code, the Code can be scanned. Each code is associated with a name, a photo, geographic information, a comment describes the code, and the associated score. Also, a code can be either public to all users or not visible to users. The Code is associated with a hashCode as unique identifier.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Code()  
      Code​(java.lang.String hashCode, java.lang.String name, boolean showPublic)
      The constructor of a Code object,it accepts a hashCode, a code name and the visibility, a specific Code is uniquely identified by hashCode.

      • stringToSHA256

        public static java.lang.String stringToSHA256​(java.lang.String str)
        The stringToSHA256 method hashes a string, so that each user can only collect unique code, no duplicate code is allowed in any user's code collection.
        Parameters:
        str - the string will be used to generate SHA256 string
        Returns:
        String
